text: Why is this outfit a sheep this time?

Oh, is it because I'm an Aries?
There are lots of stars on it too...

Oh, I wonder...?
Maybe that's part of it?

Hehe...!
I love sheep, so I'm happy with this outfit!

It's kind of... fluffy and cozy-looking,
like you could sleep well in it...
Yeah, it's soothing to look at.

Hehe, I was
talking about how comfortable this outfit feels~

Yes...! Wrapped in fluffiness,
you could fall asleep anywhere.

Producer-san,
have sweet dreams too, okay?
